CustomField.description: Multiple street lines can be entered by simply hitting enter after each line. A total of 255 characters can be entered. This field, along with the Locality field, is for use in mail merges.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Multiple street lines can be entered by simply hitting enter after each line. A total of 255 characters can be entered. This field, along with the Locality field, is for use in mail merges.
CustomField.label: Street
